title: Typographica's "Favorite of 2007" Has Arrived!
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080311233305/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 7.Mar.2008 8.30am 

It’s a feature we all love to read and reference...Typographica’s hotly anticipated [“Favorite Typefaces of 2007”](http://web.archive.org/web/20080311233305/http:/typographica.org/001124.php) is up. Go and read it now!
author: Miss Tiffany
